external_references.source_name: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022
external_references.description: Alexandre Cote Cyr. (2022, March 23). Mustang Panda’s Hodur: Old tricks, new Korplug variant. Retrieved September 9, 2025.
Secureworks Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2022, April 27). BRONZE PRESIDENT Targets Russian Speakers with Updated PlugX. Retrieved September 9, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has delayed the execution of payloads leveraging ping echo requests `cmd /c ping 8.8.8.8 -n 70&&"%temp%\<legitimate executable>"`.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)(Citation: Sophos PlugX September 2022)
